overview:
SUMMARY A highly technical and hands-on Staffing Executive with 16+ years of experience in the technical arena and leading several successful hiring initiatives for some of technology’s biggest brands. Excellent communication and people management skills and experience managing high performing and cross-cultural teams.

PROFILE Darren has had the opportunity to be an integral part of 4 global staffing organizations securing over 16 years of industry-experience. Throughout his professional career, Darren has not only maintained a “future thinking” mindset within the staffing industry but has also experienced first-hand the challenges, difficulties and success-factors needed to thrive in this ever-changing market and environment.

At this point in his career, Darren feels privileged to be a part of a leading staffing organization such as Aptitude Staffing Solutions. Furthermore, Darren’s synergistic, managerial approach has created a level of confidence and proven productivity among leading Fortune 1000 companies.

Darren looks forward to fulfilling the remainder of his career with Aptitude Staffing Solutions while contributing to America’s executive employment platform; creating possibilities and continuing to be a resource for our hiring organizations nationwide.

Specialties Aptitude Staffing Solutions’ team partners with hiring organizations across all industries while utilizing the most advanced recruiting technology combined with tenured industry-experienced Staffing Executives to source the best possible talent, satisfying all your staffing needs.

Specialized Teams: IT/Technical & Engineering
